column1: Why didn’t the mother splinter call her son on his birth-day? because he’s a little prick!
column3: A small, sharp point or thorn. / A vulgar slang term for a man’s penis.
column4: He accidentally stepped on a prick while walking barefoot.
column5: He was acting like such a prick at the party last night.

column1: Why do avon ladies walk funny? their lipstick.
column3: A thin piece of wood or other material. / Lipstick can be referred to as a stick.
column4: He picked up a stick to throw for the dog.
column5: She applied her lipstick stick carefully before going out.

column1: Let me tell you guys an alzheimer joke if I can remember it.
column3: To have in memory. / To commemorate or honor someone.
column4: Its important to remember your loved ones.
column5: She couldnt remember where she parked the car.
